description: Historical WMGHG concentrations and historical emissions of Near Term Climate Forcers (NTCFs), namely tropospheric aerosols and tropospheric ozone precurors, halocarbons (Ozone Depleting Substances) to be fixed at 1950 concentration levels. These simulations parallel the "CMIP6 historical", and differ only by fixing the anthropogenic emissions or concentrations of a specified class of species.   All other forcing agents must evolve as in "CMIP6 historical".
